Class SQLServerDBAdapter

java.lang.Object

      com.scooterframework.orm.sqldataexpress.vendor.SQLServerDBAdapter

public class SQLServerDBAdapter
extends DBAdapter

SQLServerDBAdapter class applies to Microsoft's SQL Server database.
